monq.stuff

Class CharSequenceFeeder

  • java.lang.Object
    • monq.stuff.AbstractPipe
      • monq.stuff.CharSequenceFeeder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Service, Drainer, Feeder

    public class CharSequenceFeeder
extends AbstractPipe

    implements a Feeder that feeds a CharSequence to the output specified by setOut().

    Author:
    © 2005 Harald Kirsch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CharSequenceFeeder(java.lang.CharSequence in, java.lang.String csname)
      creates the Feeder to feed in to an OutputStream while encoding characters with the character set given by csname.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class monq.stuff.AbstractPipe

        getException, run, setIn, setOut

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

                          java.lang.String csname)
                   throws java.nio.charset.UnsupportedCharsetException

        creates the Feeder to feed in to an OutputStream while encoding characters with the character set given by csname.
